DAN251.name: Introduction to Dance
DAN251.semester: Fall of every year, Summer of every year
DAN251.description: Introduction to the technique, vocabulary and appreciation of dance in its varied forms within a global context.

DAN253.name: Dance Improvisation
DAN253.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
DAN253.description: Investigation of movement components to facilitate movement problem-solving and choreographic awareness.

DAN300.name: Dance Practicum
DAN300.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
DAN300.description: Intensive experience participating in a departmental production. Assist as dancer, choreographer, rehearsal director or in other related areas.

DAN351.name: Dance Technique I
DAN351.description: Dance technique for the intermediate dancer. Intensive practicum in selected dance genres with an emphasis on enhancing efficiency and articulation of movement.

DAN352.name: Dance Technique II
DAN352.description: Dance technique for the intermediate dancer. Continued emphasis in development of the dancer with focus on efficiency and articulation of movement.

DAN354.name: Dance Choreography
DAN354.description: Intensive study in the craft of dance composition and the art of choreography.
DAN354.prerequisite: (DAN 251 and DAN 351) and (DAN 352 or DAN 451 or DAN 452)

DAN390.name: Special Topics in Dance
DAN390.description: Special topics supplementing regular course offerings on a group study basis.
DAN390.restrictions: Open to students in the Dance Specialization.

DAN451.name: Dance Technique III
DAN451.description: Dance technique for high intermediate to advanced dancer. Intensive practicum in selected dance genres that enhance the development of the dancer as a performing artist.

DAN452.name: Dance Technique IV
DAN452.description: Dance technique for the high intermediate to advanced dancer. Intensive practicum that continues to further enhance the development of the dancer artist.
